MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY24 postcode area of Borth, affecting properties in Borth and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.51PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 11.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8.28PM on 25th March 2021
